  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.text.NoCopySpan, android.text.TextWatcher, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent, android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnGlobalLayoutListener, android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnTouchModeChangeListener, android.widget.Filter.FilterListener, android.widget.RemoteViewsAdapter.RemoteAdapterConnectionCallback

    public class AnimatedExpandableListView
extends android.widget.ExpandableListView
    Code taken from: https://github.com/idunnololz/AnimatedExpandableListView The code was taken because it adapts to our existing code, and also because it is free to use, as long as you mention the author @idunnololz on GitHub This class defines an ExpandableListView which supports animations for collapsing and expanding groups.

      • expandGroupWithAnimation

        public boolean expandGroupWithAnimation(int groupPos)
        Expands the given group with an animation.
        Parameters:
        groupPos - The position of the group to expand
        Returns:
        Returns true if the group was expanded. False if the group was already expanded.

        Collapses the given group with an animation.
        Parameters:
        groupPos - The position of the group to collapse
        Returns:
